oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Price Memorial AME Zion: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Price Memorial African Methodist Episcopal Zion
Fieldnotes of Price Memorial AME Zion Church. Notes document the location of the church building in relation to Dooley Street and provide basic information about the church.

Price Memorial AME Zion's current church building dates to 1981. It sits in close proximity to several African American churches. At the time of fieldwork (June 22, 1998), J.T. Holmes served as pastor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
Field notes
